Package peersim.kademlia

package peersim.kademlia
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    peersim.kademlia.das
     
    peersim.kademlia.operations
     
  • Class
    Description
    CustomDistribution
    This control initializes the whole network (that was already created by peersim) assigning a unique NodeId, randomly generated, to every node.
    KademliaCommonConfig
    Fixed Parameters of a kademlia network.
    KademliaEvents
    Interface for events triggered by Kademlia operations.
    KademliaNode
    A Kademlia node, identified by its ID, IP address and port.
    KademliaObserver
    This class implements a simple observer of search time and hop average in finding a node in the network
    KademliaProtocol
    KademliaProtocol is a class that builds ontop of the EDProtocol interface to implement the Kademlia protocol.
    KBucket
    This class implements a kademlia k-bucket.
    KeyValueStore
    The memory store will keep data inside the class, for a specific amout of time
    Message
    Message class provide all functionalities to magage the various messages, principally LOOKUP messages (messages from application level sender destinated to another application level).
    Types Of messages:
    (application messages)
    - MSG_LOOKUP: indicates that the body Object containes information to application level of the recipient

    (service internal protocol messages)
    - MSG_JOINREQUEST: message containing a join request of a node, the message is passed between many pastry nodes accorting to the protocol
    - MSG_JOINREPLY: according to protocol, the body transport information related to a join reply message
    - MSG_LSPROBEREQUEST:according to protocol, the body transport information related to a probe request message
    - MSG_LSPROBEREPLY: not used in the current implementation
    - MSG_SERVICEPOLL: internal message used to provide cyclic cleaning service of dead nodes
    RoutingTable
    Gives an implementation for the rounting table component of a kademlia node
    SimpleEvent
    This class defines a simple event.
    StateBuilder
    Initialization class that performs the bootsrap filling the k-buckets of all initial nodes.
    In particular every node is added to the routing table of every other node in the network.
    Timeout
    This class represent a timeout event.
    TrafficGenerator
    This control generates random search traffic from nodes to random destination node.
    TrafficGeneratorPutGet
    This control generates random search traffic from nodes to random destination node.
    Turbulence
    Turbulcen class is only for test/statistical purpose.
    UniformRandomGenerator
    This initializator assign to the Nodes a nodeId (stored in the protocol MSPastryProtocol) by using this 128-bit (32 byte) random generator.
    Util
    Some utility and mathematical function to work with BigInteger numbers and strings.
